resources.string:
Mapit Spatial - Geopackage Manager version {0}

Contact us

email:
feedback@mapitgis.com
To save field you need to provide a name and add one or more values.\nPlease press the \'Add\' button to add values to the list.
There is {0} layer(s) using this attributes set - Operation cannot be completed.

You are trying to edit project which does contain underlying data. It's highly recommended that you do not change the attributes now.

Your existing data may get inconsistent with new definitions.

Are you sure you would like to continue?
This layer does not contain any features yet.\nPlease change the status of this layer to active then go back to map and add some features.
General settings related to user interface
Selected layer has got {0} underlying features.\n\nAre you sure you want to remove this layer and underlying data including attachments?
There is no layers available of this type. Please press the \'Add\' button to create new layer.
Export facility is available only as a paid extension. Do you want to buy this extension now to be able to export and share your data?
Displays last added feature attributes as default
Do you want change status of this layer to \'Active\'?\nNew features created on the map will be added to this layer. Do you wish to continue?
Do you want to remove status \'Active\' for selected layer?\nNew features created on the map will no longer be added to this layer. Do you wish to continue?
Save the attribute set name and description to create an ID. When it\'s saved please choose it from the list and press \'Edit\' to define attribute\'s fields.
This layer does not have any features yet.\nTo add features please make this layer active and recorded some data on the map.

Would you prefer MapIt in your own language? Please visit http://mapit-gis.com/translations for more details.

Changelog:
http://mapit-gis.com/changelog
You can also add this field as a TextBox type - in this case values are not required.
Select this to create features with simple name and description only.
Sample set of attributes - contains dropdownlist for species and height.
Sample Point Layer with attributes dropdownlists.
Only name and description will be attached to created features.
Are you sure - you want to delete this data?\nThis operation cannot be reversed!\n
Are you sure you want to delete this value?\nThe data gathered so far for this project will be affected!\n
Are you sure you want to delete this attribute and underlying values?\nThe data gathered so far for this project will be affected!\n

To import data from files, please copy them into

Device Memory->Mapit-Spatial->Import folder.

At the moment supported types of files are:

-CSV (lat,lon,name) for points, KML and geojson for points, lines and polygons.

Please visit our website to get more information about import operation.
Refreshing features on map, please wait…

To import data from files, please copy them into

Device Memory->Mapit-Spatial->AttributeSets folder.

At the moment supported types of files are:

-TXT (each value in new line)

Please visit our website to get more information about import attributes operation.
Do you want to stop editing this feature?
Do you want to remove this feature?
Paste or type Mapbox access token here
Mapbox access token has been set. You can use Mabox maps now.
Mapbox access token is required if you want to access your Mapbox maps.
Provided token is not valid or cannot be validated…
\nPlease set your valid Mapbox token in Settings->Cloud Accounts
Please copy your .mbtiles files to\nDevice Memory->Mapit-Spatial->OfflineMaps folder.
Error: There was a problem with importing features from file.
This file does not contain any {0} features to import.\nPlease check your import file or select another layer.
Export has failed.\nThe layer is empty.\nPlease add some features to the layer then try again.
Please create some layers to get them listed here.
The theme change will be applied when you start the application again.
Approximates mean sea level (Orthometric height = GPS ellipsoidal height - Geoid height)
Download error occurred, please try again.

Selected layer has got {0} underlying features.

Are you sure you want to remove all underlying data and attachments files?

The layer will be emptied but not removed.
GPS is not enabled. Do you want to go to settings menu?
Location is not active. Please use button \'Centre on GPS\' or start recording the track to activate this panel.
Mixed settings related to different parts of the app
Add new points providing Distance & Bearing from current GPS, Base or cursor location.

Looks like this layer is trying to use an attribute set which does not have any fields.
Operation cannot be completed.

Please check your fields in 'Manage Attributes' section of the application.
Track recording service is running in the background.
Base Points Layer will be visible in \'Manage Layers\' section.
Points in this layer are the source for a Base Points dropdown list when \'Bearing & Distance\' method is used.
Use last added feature\'s name as default
Show Description Field for layers using attribute set.
Check if name already exist when saving feature.
Feature named {0} already exist. Please chose different name or disable the check name option in Survey Settings.

To import Attribute Set form file please copy the import file into:

Device Memory->Mapit-Spatial->AttributeSets folder.

Attribute Set can be imported from structured JSON file.

Please visit our website to get more information about importing attribute set.
File does not contain name property.
File does not contain any fields to import.
One or more field is missing name property.
One or more field is missing values.
This attribute set does not contain any Fields yet.
Attribute Set import file is corrupted or not in JSON format.\n\nImport Failed.
Buy any extension to remove adds.
Waiting for accurate location details to start navigation…

To add Open Street Map Type Service please fill in Name and URL property into the fields below. The service must be in Web Mercator projection (ESPG: 3857).
Sample URL for OSM type service tile looks like:

http://b.tile.openstreetmap.org/17/63963/40837.png

where last sections of the URL contains zoom level and x,y coordinates of the tile.

To add the service you need to provide only first part of the URL - so it should look like:

http://b.tile.openstreetmap.org or 
http://tile.waymarkedtrails.org/hiking.
Only features from active layer can be selected on the map
Long press to change the mode (Distance/Area)
Use paired laser rangefinder to add points
Please pair your rangefinder with this device in System Settings to continue.
Save pictures to removable SD card
All recorded points will get same attributes as the first point in the recording session.
Click to enable external GNSS receiver and select the location source from the paired devices. Receiver must stream NMEA sentences over bluetooth.
Selected external GPS receiver is not available. Please checked your settings or switch ON external device and re-start the application.
Should be OFF as default. However you may try it when having problems with connection.

It looks like the MOCK location is not enabled in Android settings.
The current position from external GPS device cannot be acquired.

Please enable MOCK locations and restart the application to use external GPS as the location source.

1. Make sure the device (External GPS) is paired in Android Bluetooth settings.
2. Enable Mock Location in Android Developer Settings (In Android 6 please set MapIt as Mock Location application)
3. Switch ON the External GPS switch above and choose the external GPS receiver.
4. When getting back to map the location source will be automatically swapped to External GPS however you may need to restart application.
Please type your EPSG code e.g. EPSG:3007
Please select \'Custom: EPSG code\' from the dropdown above to activate text field below.
MapIt track recording service is running in background.
Tracking service - Problem with track details…
Import cancelled:\nThe file you are trying to import is not in WGS84 (EPSG:4326) projection.
Properties of this feature are not available.
Enable Waze Navigation for points and vertices.
Blocks possibility to drag point features (restart required).
Thanks to people who helped me with the translation of this application.
Report an issue or request new features
Get instant access to news and announcements.
Press to open website in the browser
Restart the appliaction to apply this change.

If you enjoy using {0}, please take a moment to rate it. 
Your feedback helps us to improve existing functionality and implement things you may need. 

Thanks for your support!
To add one or more fields please press the \'Add\' button.
The purchase cannot be progressed. Please check your Internet connection or Google account settings.
This point has {0} pictures attached. They are saved in: {1} folder.
Current location cannot be established, please wait for GPS signal or check your Android location settings.

Only ArcGIS Server tiled services can be added. Service spatial reference must be Web Mercator (ESPG:3857)
Sample service URL: 
http://services.arcgisonline.com/ArcGIS/rest/services/USA_Topo_Maps/MapServer

Please visit our website for more details or contact us directly in case of problems.
At the moment secure services are not supported…

Service must support Web Mercator (ESPG:3857) projection.
Sample WMS URL: 

https://map.bgs.ac.uk/arcgis/services/BGS_Detailed_Geology/MapServer/WMSServer
Set your own Bing Map key for better performance.
Application is using your personal Bing Map Key.
Checking if provided key is valid.
The key provided is not valid or there is no Internet connection to validate the key.
Bing Map key is required to use the Bing Maps layers. Please set one in the General Setting section.
GPS service is not available, make sure it\'s switch on in Android System Settings.
Bearing or Distance has incorrect values
Do not display this message any more.
Export has failed.\nPlease try again and if the problems still exists please do report a problem.
The data has been successfully uploaded to Dropbox APPS folder.
An error has occurred during the remote operation.
Press to clear current DropBox connection settings.
Do you want to clear current DropBox connection settings?
Selected file is being uploaded to DropBox…\nPlease wait.
DropBox account is now linked, please re-try the DropBox Export.
Upload files to DropBox->Apps folder to get them listed here.
Set necessary parameters to enable export to PostgreSQL database or FTP location
Set necessary parameters to enable export to FTP location
Provide server name or IP address
Set number of positions used for averaging.
Count position only if HDOP is lower than
Count position if accuracy is greater than
Alternatively you can download the JSON file attached and import it into {0} application using \'Import\' option on WMS Services menu.

No WMS config files are available for import. Please make sure the JSON files containing WMS configuration are present in Android Download or {0} -> Import folder. The file name should start with "WMS" and the extension should be ".json".
Export to FTP includes all the layer attachments and may take long time. Large number of data might be transferred over the network and it is recommended to do it using the Wi-Fi connection.
Export to Postgres database has failed. Please check the database connection in Settings->Remote Export and try again.
Export to FTP has failed. Please check connection details in Settings->Remote Export and try again.
Include HDOP, VDOP, PDOP, HRMS, VRMS… with point layers export.
Position accuracy is below the minimum accuracy settings…

1. Please download a file from National Geospatial Intelligence Agency model from August 2014. File can be found at http://earth-info.nga.mil/GandG/wgs84/gravitymod/egm2008/Small_Endian/Und_min2.5x2.5_egm2008_isw=82_WGS84_TideFree_SE.gz 

2. Extract downloaded file: 

Und_min2.5x2.5_egm2008_isw=82_WGS84_TideFree_SE

 and rename it to: 

EGM2008_M25.geoid

3. Place this model in {0}->Resources folder.
Error: \nConnection to {0} failed! \nPlease check your settings…
Select feature to zoom to it.
Selected feature is on hidden layer. Make the layer visible to see the geometry on the map.
Please use negative values for South and West hemisphere.
Please input the Easting and Northing below.

Imports Layer with all the existing attributes.\nAttribute set will be created automatically, however all fields will be defined as free entry TextBox.\n If you want to import existing geometries into the layer with AttributeSet defined please select the layer from the list and Import the geometries into the layer.
Press to authorize this app use Dropbox…
Not authorized. Please go to \"Cloud Settings\" and press \"Connect to Dropbox\" option.
Eos Tools Pro - Eos Arrow Receivers
Feed Mapit with location provided by Eos Tools Pro app and your Eos Arrow GNSS receiver.
Feed Mapit with location provided by Zeno Connect app and your Leica GNSS receiver.

To use local geoid model in Mapit you need to have a file available in binary (little-endian) format compatible with US National Geodetic Survey (*.bin) format.

Compatible file should be renamed to LOCAL_GEOID.bin and placed in {0}->Resources folder.

Please check http://mapit-gis.com/geoid-height-extension to get more details.
Click to enable external GNSS receiver and access location source over TCP protocol. Receiver must stream NMEA sentences over TCP.
Create new point features or polygon or line vertices by typing in coordinates.
WFS Layer - Max number of features
WFS Layer - Minimum zoom level to draw the layer (default 16)

WFS Service must support version 2.0.0 or 1.1.0 of the WFS standard, layers default projection must be set as EPSG: 4326 (WGS84) and must be able to return responses in JSON format.

Sample URL: https://ahocevar.com/geoserver/wfs

Please visit our website for more details or contact us directly in case of problems.
At the moment secure services are not supported…
WFS version must be 1.1.0 or 2.0.0 - Please contact the WFS service provider to get more information.
Please select WFS layer below and \'Save Configuration\' - afterwards select and edit the layer to change the layer style like color and outline size.
Maximum {0} WFS layers can be visible at the same time. Please change visibility of other layers to make this layer visible.
This WFS service does not support JSON output and cannot be used in Mapit. Please contact service provider.
This WFS service does not contain any layers with default projection set to WGS84. Please contact service provider.
Feed Mapit with location provided by TMM app and your Trimble antenna e.g. Trimble Catalyst

Please copy your geo-images to
Device Memory->Mapit-Spatial->OfflineMaps folder.
Make sure the world files describing the image bounds are placed in the same folder with the same name as the image itself.

Please visit Offline Maps & Mapbox extension to get more information.
Unable to save. There are blank required fields on the form:\n\n
Make first item selected when creating new feature.
Click to enable Mapit NTRIP Client as location source.
Mapit is not able to detect NTRIP Client Output Stream. Please STOP and START NTRIP Service to reconnect.

Mapit GIS NTRIP Client application is not installed. It is a separate application allowing you to use RTK corrected locations in Mapit. If you want to try it out for free for 7 days please install the app now.

More information:
http://mapit-gis.com/mapit-gis-ntrip-client
Set accuracy as HRMS when available.
Create new or Append existing table
Create new or Overwrite existing table
Data has been exported.\nTable {0} has been successfully {1} in PostgreSQL database.

Both options will create new PostgreSQL table named {0} if it does not exist yet. Please select option one if you would like to append existing data or option two to overwrite and replace existing table.
Please select option above to continue.
Press to authorize this app to use Google Drive.
Press to clear current GDrive connection settings
Upload files to Gdrive->MapitGIS folder to get them listed here.
The data has been successfully uploaded to Google Drive->{0} folder.
Accuracy & GPS Quality on the map.
Set number of seconds used for averaging.
Attribute set has been exported and saved to:
Features can be selected on the map

This function of Mapit Spatial does require a valid Google subscription to run. The subscription is valid for a period of 1 calendar year and provides access to all software functionality. Please press \'OK\' to continue and start 7 days FREE trial period.
This device is not supported. Try to install or update Google Play Services.
You need to accept permissions to get MapIt running. Please restart the app and accept required permissions…
Please copy your .gpkg files to\nDevice Memory->Mapit-Spatial->Geopackages folder.
Please set active geopackage on \"Geopackages\" tab to see the layers listed here.
Selected geopackage does not contains any layers.
Spatial reference will be set as WGS84(EPSG:4326), please check this option to set layer coordinate system as {0}.
Provided value doesn\'t match selected field type.
Please set default value for NOT NULL field.
Selected Field will be removed from layer. This cannot be undone.\nAre you sure?
This field cannot be removed - it is currently linked in following layers:\n\n
Please remove all fields before removing the attribute set.
Selected Attribute Set field data type does not match the underlying Database field type. Please select another field or create valid field in \'Attributes Management\'. \nThis link cannot be saved!
Selected geopackage does not contain any Attribute Sets defined, please use \'Attributes Management\' to create new attribute set and define fields, which then can be linked in here.
Not able to find valid attribute set. Please make sure you have created the attribute set and it contains valid fields defined.
You have not yet created any \'Attribute Set\' for selected geopackage. Please press the \'Add\' or \'Import\' (button with arrow) below.
Selected projection is not supported - the coordinate system will be reset to WGS84
Field cannot be removed for this table. There was a problem with primary key and geometry field column index id.
This value can be set only when the layer is empty.
This operation cannot be undone. Geopackage file, all underlying data (layers) and attributes will be removed. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Feed Mapit with location provided by SXblue ToolBox application.
X,Y,Z (projected) or Lat, Lon, Alt (geographic) columns will be added to POINT layers export.
Enable Mapit fields [created, updated] for layer

Following fields:

- mapit_created_date
- mapit_updated_date

will be added to the layer.

This option cannot be disabled.

Mapit fields cannot be removed and will be updated only by the application when records are created or edited.

Do you wish to continue?
Please use different name - table named {0} already exists.
This application must be activated on this device or existing licence must be refreshed.\n\nPlease contact software provider by pressing \"Request License Now\" button.
I would like to order Mapit Spatial Pro licence. Please find my contact details below.
Check licence information or request new licence.
The application licence will expire in {0} days.
Set Style Colour - this colour will be use to style point and line features as well when used with polygon layer to style the polygon outline.
Set Style Fill Colour - used to style the polygon fill.
To add the style please press the \'Add\' button.
This style is currently being used in the attributes configuration. Operation has been cancelled.
This style is being used in fields configuration - Do you wish to continue?
All styles set for the field values will be reset. Do you wish to continue?

Service must comply with Google zoom levels.
Please use URL to the service capabilities e.g.

https://basemap.nationalmap.gov/arcgis/rest/services/USGSTopo/MapServer/WMTS/1.0.0/WMTSCapabilities.xml

http://maps.wien.gv.at/wmts/1.0.0/WMTSCapabilities.xml
Only WMTS version 1.0.0 is supported at the moment - Please contact the WMTS service provider to get more information.
This Service is not compatible with Google Maps. Please contact your service provider for more info.
This WMTS service does not contain any supported layers. Please contact service provider.
Provide your own Tianditu Basemaps Key
Enable to set local SR as default when creating new layer.
